enhanced_by.reason: The validate method is used to ensure the ISSN code is valid before conversion, which is a prerequisite for convertToEAN13.
The isValid method can be used to pre-validate the ISSN code, similar to the validate method, providing an additional layer of validation.
The extractFromEAN13 method can be used to verify the correctness of the EAN-13 code generated by convertToEAN13, ensuring the conversion process is accurate.
